title: (47320) Tudela de Duero - 60A Calle Herrera
description: Double service station with small adjacent parking but wider 100 m away (following asphalted way) max overnight = 72 h, illuminated and shadow, aside sport area, along Douro river in Tudela de Duero village which center is opposite riverside; cycling and walkway crosses the river and leads to the center of small town, with return by main bridge (30 min circuit).

title: (47320) Tudela de Duero - SN Avenida de la Estación
title_short: (47320) Tudela de Duero - SN Avenida de la Estación
description: Perfect location 2 minutes from the city center on foot near an old freight station. flat and gravelled ground there are a few holes

title: (47320) Tudela de Duero - 39 Calle Herrera
description: Pinar Herrera Street, Tudela de Duero. Follow the street to the pine forest where you can sleep.

title: (47320) Tudela de Duero -
description:
Inmitten eines Pinienwaldes.
4x4 ist nicht erforderlich.
Natur pur.

title: (47162) Los Aljibes - Unnamed Road
description: Recreation area equipped with barbecues, tables, gazebos, children's games. Space for many vehicles.

title: (47161) Herrera de Duero - 11 Plaza Mayor
description: Ample parking to visit the town with playground.

title: (47161) Herrera de Duero - 25 Camino del Puente
title_short: (47161) Herrera de Duero - 25 Camino del Puente
description: In Herrera de Duero, next to the Valladolid-Segovia highway. 10 minutes from Valladolid, very quiet at night. Next to a small beach on the Douro river for bathing in Summer. In the village there are small supermarkets, bars and restaurants.

title: (47330) Traspinedo - 92 Carretera Valladolid
description: Motorhome area on the Ribera del Duero route in the town of Traspinedo (Valladolid), available for electricity, emptying of water... Within the urban area with access to all the services of a town with a great gastronomic appeal with its typical Pincho de Suckling lamb, and numerous food stores.

title: (47162) Aldeamayor de San Martín - s/n Paseo del Arroyo
title_short: (47162) Aldeamayor de San Martín - s/n Paseo del Arroyo
description: area the grove

title: (47160) Portillo - VA-V-2052
description: Fuente Minguez recreational area. Natural environment surrounded by pine trees. Access by asphalted forest path from Portillo or La Parrilla and from Montemayor by dirt forest road. Barbecue service, fountain (not all year), indoor soccer and basketball court, as well as a children's playground.

title: (47193) Cistérniga - 1 Camino Renedo
description: Flat unpaved place with easy access for both Camper and Ac good place for day and night very quiet, residential area bar, lupa supermarket churreria less than 50 meters super quiet night

title: (47170) Renedo de Esgueva - Sector Sau 10
description: Free parking in a picnic area, with fountain and basketball courts along the Esgueva River, great place for walking, cycling or enjoying the cuisine of Renedo de Esgueva, just two kilometers along. the bike path this park "the valley of the six senses" strongly recommended to go with the children. more there is open access in a youth center

title: (47160) Portillo - 1D Avenida Castillo
description: Parking the feet of the Castle with incredible views. Phenomenal to visit the beautiful town of Portillo, taste its famous mantecados and know its crafts.

title: (47160) Portillo - 44 Calle Colegio
description: IMPORTANT: From September 7 to 10 (both included), PARKING AND OVERNIGHT STAYS PROHIBITED due to the Patron Saint Holidays (sorry for the inconvenience). Nice place to rest. It has a water fountain in the picnic area. A loading and unloading space has been operational for 2 months. This area and eco-sanitary point has been promoted by the Castilian and Leonese association of motorhome owners (ACYLA). Inaugurated on May 30, 2022. Exclusive use for motorhomes and campers.

title: (47331) Santibáñez de Valcorba - VP-2304
description: Siding about 50 meters from a little traveled road, very quiet area at any time of the day. There are tables and benches near the parking lot and further on a lagoon (it does not have water all year round) the siding is for about 8 vans parking on battery, an AC or a GV would have to park in parallel. Very flat area and surrounded by nature.

title: (47140) Laguna de Duero - 16 Calle Tajo
description: Ample parking, shared with all types of vehicles. No service. Stable sand floor Bars, restaurant, supermarket, gas station, etc. very close. Perfect to visit the town.

title: (47140) Laguna de Duero - 39T Calle Nogal
description: Quiet place to spend the night. There is a supermarket, a DIY store and a shop for items for caravans and camping.

title: (47340) Sardón de Duero - 5 Calle Nevera
description: Accessible area next to the road with a picnic area, bathing in the river and all the services of the town 2 minutes away

title: (47012) Valladolid - 73A Calle Canterac
description: Perfect place in the center and very quiet.

title: (47011) Valladolid - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet dirt parking near the center of Valladolid (15 minutes), in front of the university. There is a drinking fountain on the opposite side of the road. It is a large parking lot and accessible to any long vehicle.

title: (47004) Valladolid - 4 Calle San Luis
description: Laundromat, open from 8:00 a.m. to 10:30 p.m. Every day.

title: (47008) Valladolid - 8 Calle de la Azucarera
description: Parking in the Parque de las Norias, an old factory converted into a beautiful park, relatively close to the center, supermarkets and bars nearby, crossing the tracks by a pedestrian crossing, a dog park, a quiet place to walk and spend the night. there is also a water fountain but a bit far from the place to park

title: (47011) Valladolid - 6D Camino del Cementerio
description: Quiet street with parking on both sides of the road. The center is about 15 minutes walk. We have dined at the gondomatik restaurant (good food and live music) and we have spent one night here. Overall a pleasant stay.

title: (47011) Valladolid - 20 Calle Jardines de Sabatini
description: Free unattended parking, 15 minutes walk from the center, is not specific to motorhomes but there is always some, near there is supermarket, shopping center and a bar,

title: (47153) Pinar de Antequera - Calle del Arca Real
title_short: (47153) Pinar de Antequera - Calle del Arca Real
description: Quiet place between nature and an urbanization that separates a road with little traffic. super quiet. Picnic tables, park and more than 50 parking spaces. There are no services. Bars a few meters away.

title: (47150) Viana de Cega - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area in a very good pine forest, with the river to be able to bathe, places with sun and shade at ease, plenty of parking, a very quiet place, a beach bar to be able to drink and eat something

title: (47010) Valladolid - 9 Plaza Ribera de Castilla
description: New laundry, we park 150m away with our 7.50m CC (calle de la Rábida).

description:
Parking next to the Río Pisuerga promenade. Very calm.
tourist squares but with wide sidewalks that allow us to park our 5-7m vehicles.

title: (47014) Valladolid - 2 Calle Calixto Valverde

title: (47014) Valladolid - 6 Calle Leopoldo de Castro

title: (47014) Valladolid - 6P Calle Pío del Río Hortega

description: Very quiet night, 2 km from the city center on foot?

name: Motorhome Parking Valladolid
title: (47009) Motorhome Parking Valladolid
description: Motorhome area paying 5 euros for 24 hours. Quiet area 10 minutes from downtown. Bars for breakfast next door. If you go with pets, there is a vet next door for any emergency. Green areas for pets. Emptying of gray and black water (box on the ground) and filling with water in another box on the ground with water intakes. You pay when you arrive by parking meter or app. recommendable

title: (47009) Valladolid - 7c Avenida del Euro

title: (47014) Valladolid - 4 Calle Gavilla
description: SmartWash laundry opening hours from 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. every day of the year

title: (47009) Valladolid - 39P Calle Balago
description: Large parking area, near the police and the Service Area, dimly lit at night. Be careful on days when there is a lot of activity at the nearby Trade Fair and on weekday mornings it can be difficult to maneuver in the car park. Supermarket DAY next door.

title: (47009) Valladolid - 7 Calle Trilla
description: Very ample parking. A little lean. In front of supermarket. 20 minutes to the center.

title: (47016) Valladolid - 50 P.Act.las Raposas 1
description: Large parking lot. No sign of prohibition! We had our lunch break after our shopping at the nearby Lidl. The slope was acceptable to us. Very calm at the moment!

title: (47014) Valladolid - 5 Avenida del Real Valladolid
description: The parking lot of a fast food restaurant (Popeyes), quiet, seemed safe for the night. No problem during our sleep.

title: (47014) Valladolid - Camino Caño Morante
description: A quiet place in front of the Valladolid stadium with many places

title: (47152) Puente Duero-Esparragal - 1 Camino Playa

description: Parking right on Douro, small winding path leads down to the river with swimming! No service. Single-lane bridge is used until at night, even with tractors, but is bearable for a stopover.

title: (47350) Quintanilla de Onésimo -
description: Area and eco-sanitary point for motorhomes in the municipality of Quintanilla de Onésimo. Drinking water in a casket under a lid with a stopcock and emptying of black water in a casket also under a lid on the ground. The area is next to the sports center. Inauguration and advice of ACYLA.

title: (47610) Zaratán - 1 Calle Biobala
description: Quiet neighborhood in Zaratán.

title: (47260) Cabezón de Pisuerga - Autovía de Castilla
title_short: (47260) Cabezón de Pisuerga - Autovía de Castilla
description: Large car park, with tables and bins. Highway at 150m, without much noise.

title: (47209) San Martín de Valvení - 3 Calle Oriente
title_short: (47209) San Martín de Valvení - 3 Calle Oriente
description: Picnic place with garbage and drinking water

title: (47610) Zaratán - 51 Paseo del Ferrocarril
description: Parking to start via verde train of the donkey, about 7kms round trip accessible wheelchair, bicycles.

title: (47130) Simancas - 16D Carretera Puente Duero
description: Parking next to the football fields, quite shady, with plenty of parking spaces.

title: (47281) Corcos - Unnamed Road
description: Monastery car park. Quiet place. After visiting Valladolid, it was a rest stop. There is no service but it is a quiet place. You can hear the background noise of the highway and a train track passes nearby but it is still a very quiet place.

title: (47130) El Plantío - 29 Carretera Puente Duero
description: Simancas is a Spanish municipality in the province of Valladolid, in the autonomous community of Castilla y León. In the town, located next to the course of the Pisuerga River, there is the General Archive of Simancas. Area requested by the Castilian and Leonese Motorhome Association. Thank you to the city council for its creation.

title: (47130) Simancas - Camino del Batán
description: Bucolic break at the edge of the water with optional visit of the village. While crossing the river by the stone bridge, you will be able to accede to a bar where to drink a glass on the grass in the shade of tall trees.

title: (47130) Simancas - 5136 Calle de Robladillo
description: Quiet place to swim and spend the night.

title: (47130) Simancas - 11 Camino Ronda
description: Parking near the center, easy access from the highway, free for lunch or overnight, highway close enough, earplugs recommended. No service.

title: (47230) Matapozuelos -
description: Near the Vado de la Cobatilla path. Also near the river, paddling. Very quiet, in the middle of nature, on the edge of a fragrant pine forest and overlooking flower meadows. We only had a picnic here, but it seems wonderful to spend the night.

title: (47270) Cigales - 5 Ronda Especería
description: Winnie's laundry. Great launderette at super cheap prices and a parking space right outside the door. You can eat while waiting for your laundry at the Kebab next door or do your shopping at the supermarket 100m away.

title: (40214) Mata de Cuéllar - 9 Calle Cogeces
description: A village park with a fountain and swings. Ideal to make a stop, eat (it has tables and benches) rest or spend the night. It has a nearby mountain and a pine forest to take a walk. Has a store 50 meters away to buy food

title: (47270) Cigales - 30 Calle Majada
description: New AC 2021 area in a large town, 5km from the highway, in a quiet area. It has 3 free places. Drinking water (be careful, in winter the tap may be frozen), gray and black water drained. It is better to enter large motorhomes through Los cortijos avenue (the road where the Lupa supermarket is). Near paths to walk, bakery (delicious), visit wineries and swimming pool in summer.

title: (47130) Panorama - Unnamed Road
description:
Small bay overlooking a tributary of the Douro. Maximum 2 small vans or one larger vehicle. The GPS does not yet know the gravel road.
Peaceful place if you don't want to pause at a rest stop.

title: (47420) Íscar - 117 Carretera Íscar-Cuéllar
description: Recreational area with fountains, terrace-bar, shaded bathrooms, tables and barbecues. Near Iscar.

title: (47420) Íscar - 11 Calle Ronda
description: Self-service laundry open from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., every day of the year. We also have a 24-hour vending service with drinks, snacks and parapharmacy. We are in front of the Gadis supermarket, an easy parking area. In the urban center, we recommend going up to the castle of Íscar.

title: (40200) Cuéllar - 22 SG-P-2041
description: Meadow of the Henar. At 5km from Cuéllar, a magnificent place to spend the night without noise and among trees, during the week it is almost empty. In the middle of August on Wednesday we were alone. Without water but with garbage containers

title: (47200) Valoria la Buena - Camino de Servicio
title_short: (47200) Valoria la Buena - Camino de Servicio
description: In the middle of nature .. narrow dirt road with deep holes., Not for high vehicles because of drooping branches ..

title: (47239) Villanueva de Duero - 49 Polígono San Martín
title_short: (47239) Villanueva de Duero - 49 Polígono San Martín
description: New municipal installation. There are picnic tables behind the hermitage.

name: Camping Cubillas
title: (27329) Camping Cubillas
description: Campsite located in Cubilas de Santa Marta along the A62 autovia at km 102. Correct, clean and easy to access. Wifi around the bar. Exit possible from 7 a.m.

title: (47290) Cubillas de Santa Marta - VA-103
description: Exit 102 towards the station small break at the water's edge on both sides of the canal without the noise of the autovia but with the train

title: (47290) Cubillas de Santa Marta - 89 Extrarradio Diseminados
title_short: (47290) Cubillas de Santa Marta - 89 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: road noise

title: (40213) Vallelado -
description: La Minguela recreational area next to the Cega river. It has tables, barbecues (Take into account any restrictions that may exist), children's swings and a garbage container. Quiet place to spend the day and night. In wild nature. Starting point of the Minguela path.

title: (47132) Villamarciel - 8B Calle Prado
description: Small picnic area next to a playground. It has trees and room for 3/4 motorhomes. Fountain with drinking water. Next to the Senda del Duero (GR) Located 1.2 kms from the A62. Quiet town.

title: (47239) Villanueva de Duero -
description: Bivouac place in the pine forest along the Douro.. very quiet. be careful not to make a fire because it is very dry. we had a quiet night. possibility to park several vehicles. more suitable for 4x4s and vans.

title: (47132) Tordesillas - VA-VP-5804
description: It is a truck parking lot but now they are expanding and servicing motorhomes. By eating in the restaurant there are hours of free parking. You can spend the night there. There is a guard 24 hours. You can also store the caravan there, you can choose whether to keep it outdoors or in a ship. The price is 35 or 60 euros per month depending on where you keep it.

title: (47239) Villanueva de Duero -
description: Very peaceful little place by the Duero river. Only one place for small van Cc. Small dusty path so be kind enough to drive slowly to avoid smoking out any walkers. The place is located 2km from the village of San Miguel del Pinto with all amenities, small restaurant, grocery store...

title: (47180) Villafuerte - 10 Calle Cruz
description: Special place east of Villafuerte de Esgueva, located in a hillock, with exceptional charm such as the Castle of Garci Franco de Toledo, from the fifteenth century, with magical sunsets of the sunset, with the background of the Castilian landscape. It is very worthwhile, to stop, to recreate the view both in the Landscape and in the Castle, which can be visited with a small donation It should be noted that if you spend the night on a weekend, from Friday to Sunday, you can see the illuminated Castle.

title: (47282) - Unnamed Road
description: Very close to exit 102 of the N80 towards Burgos. Quiet corner under the poplars. Flat terrain.

title: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - 5A Calle del Río
title_short: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - 5A Calle del Río
description: Very shady official parking lot with absolute peace and a fantastic view.

title: (47410) Aguasal - Camino de la Ermita
description: Recreational area next to the hermitage of Sacedon. Pine forest area with picnic tables. Very quiet to spend the night. There is no source or services

title: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - 11 Calle Río Duero
title_short: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - 11 Calle Río Duero
description: Picnic area located by the river. With shade It has a table nearby. In the village there are bars. There are no signs prohibiting staying the night.

title: (40200) Cuéllar - 4 Camino de las Lomas
description: Parking area and services next to Castillo de Cuellar.

title: (47114) Matilla de los Caños - Camino de Villamarciel
title_short: (47114) Matilla de los Caños - Camino de Villamarciel
description: Quiet little wood to stop for the night.

title: (40200) Cuéllar - 31 Calle Palacio
description: Esplanade of land enabled as parking in front of the castle, without services. We spend the night next to other motorhomes without problem, there is no prohibition sign

title: (40200) Cuéllar - 1X Calle del Toro
description: Next to the Ayto motorhome area is the El Duque garden park with a wide variety of trees and shade. It has picnic tables, a spring fountain, swings, an open-air gym, a pet area and, in the summer months, a beach bar with access to toilets. Recommended on your visit to Cuéllar

title: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - Camino Molino
title_short: (47132) San Miguel del Pino - Camino Molino
description: Super quiet location on the banks of the Douro. You have to leave the main path and go down a small steep path that takes you to this shady place with a beach.

title: (40200) Cuéllar - Camino de las Lomas
description: Place at the top of the so-called "Lomas" where you can see on its south side the sea of pine forests and the Sierra de Guadarrama and on the north the castle of Cuéllar with its walled enclosure and the towers of its churches. Ideal for spending the afternoon strolling, cycling and photographing the village from a higher point. To spend the night there is an AC point with free drinking water and waste disposal next to the castle.

title: (40200) Cuéllar - 46 Avenida Camilo Jose Cela
description: Laundry hours 9 to 22

title: (40200) Cuéllar - Paseo santa Clara
description: Fountain in the park of the convent of Sra Clara. The park has swings for the little ones. Very close to the sports facilities and the gas station

title: (40217) Fresneda de Cuéllar - 3 Calle Carrapiron
description: Parking area in front of the cemetery. Next to it there is a park with a picnic area, playground and drinking water fountain. Vehicles are not allowed to enter the park.

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 148 Autovía de Castilla
description: Gas Station and Restaurant Parking, next to the highway. It has a night toilet. Security cameras 24h and security guard at night. Bathrooms for shower close at 10:30 pm

title: (47314) Langayo - VA-210
description: shaded picnic area, next to the pools, good parking and possible area next to the Douro riverbank.

title: (47220) Pozaldez - 5 Plaza Corretoro
description: A town famous for Luisito de Pozaldez, famous in many towns in Castilla for making a living reciting minstrels in exchange for money, it has a monument in honor of him, it also has two bars and two Gothic-style churches

title: (34210) Dueñas - Unnamed Road
description: Nice quiet place to stand but many locals. with trash can so people clean up your mess because it will be a mess here (including those white / brown papers) we were here with a large combi camper bus caravan.

title: (40215) Arroyo de Cuéllar - 3 Calle Parque
description: Camping Area. with swings area. ideal for visiting Cuéllar and coca (route of the castles). We have not slept but it seems a very quiet area.

title: (47192) Castrodeza - 42 Calle del Pozo
description: Newly created area. 6 seats. Level and shaded (afternoon). Very calm. All services, except electricity. Next to a children's play area, sports court, paddle tennis and soccer field. Many nearby towns to see. The views from the Peñaflor de Hornija viewpoint are essential. Torrelobaton Castle, Santa Espina Monastery and very close to Valladolid. Exclusive use of motorhomes.

title: (47491) La Seca - 1 Plaza Olma
description: Parking for several Motorhomes with water point and sewage discharge. You can visit several Verdejo wine cellars.

title: (47491) La Seca - 4 Calle Santiago Sanz
description: Municipal parking lot with a source of drinking water, garbage containers and a bar in front with food-type portions and hamburgers. It is also the starting point of wine tourism routes

title: (47491) La Seca - 36 Calle Santísimo Cristo
description: Parking 2 minutes from the main square of the town. In the village, bakeries, butchers, bars and restaurant. The parking lot is located between the funeral home and the cemetery. Quiet place to spend the night. It has no services.

title: (47100) Urbanización El Montico -
description: Ideal place for a one night stop in a pine forest

title: () Dueñas - 11 Avenida Palencia
description: Brilliant and simple. Clean, fresh water, grey dump and wc point. Excellent

title: (47410) Olmedo - 1 Camino Cementerio
description: Very quiet place to sleep, and away from the road. We tried to sleep here, because the AC area is right next to the national road and it was very noisy at night.

title: (47310) Campaspero - 19 Calle Labajos
description: Place to spend the night in the sports area of the town. Swings, fountain, fronton, running track and in summer on the street parallel to the pools. The town has all the services (bars, restaurants, pharmacy, shop and supermarket, butcher, library ...)

title: (34218) Cevico de la Torre - 7 Calle Puesto
title_short: (34218) Cevico de la Torre - 7 Calle Puesto
description: Cevico De La Torre motorhome area, in the heart of Cerrato Palentino, with drinking water, gray and black water drainage, and tables with benches. The town has a pharmacy next door, a bakery, a butcher, a bar, a typical cheese shop, a playground, a kiosk with a tobacconist and a sports center very close. In summer swimming pool with showers 200 meters away. Many areas for hiking and mountain biking around with incredible views of the Cerrato, its wineries and vineyards.

title: () Olmedo - N-601
description: Motorhome area next to the Mudejar museum

title: (47410) Olmedo - Paseo de san Juan
description: Parking area on Paseo San Juan, it is not a suburb street, it is on Paseo San Juan, a quiet, tree-lined area, with well leveled sand without services but with nearby containers and a water source 100 meters away. Ideal for a night or two if you don't need many services. 5 minutes away there is another area of Caravans somewhat neglected but with water services and wastewater and waste bins.

title: (47315) Pesquera de Duero -
description: Site with very nice view and well isolated. To get there take the direction of Ermita de Nuestra Señora de Rubialejos, and continue straight on the track. Only the last ramp can be difficult for a van. Your turn to judge. There are trees but they are too low to get under. however it is quite flat.

title: (47314) Peñafiel - 273 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Rest area next to a gas station. It gives peace of mind to know that some trucks also sleep. It is spacious so it allows you to get far enough away from the refrigerated trucks to avoid noise.

title: (34210) Dueñas - 1 Calle Monte
description: In the middle of the mountains, a very quiet place to spend the day or spend the night. It has no services, a few swings, goals, basketball hoops, benches and tables, barbecues and garbage cans.

title: (40218) Fuente el Olmo de Íscar - 1 Carretera Samboal
title_short: (40218) Fuente el Olmo de Íscar - 1 Carretera Samboal
description: Recreational area in Fuente el Olmo, It has picnic tables, barbecues, a fountain with a 3/4" thread, children's swings, a garbage container, an open-air sports center and a racquetball court. Lots of shade and very cool since the ground is grass. Parking next to graveyard

title: (47315) Valladolid - 5 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Campa of the hermitage of San Isidro on the outskirts of the town of Pesquera de Duero. In the middle of the wine route, and surrounded by vineyards. Charming and quiet place to arrive, follow the path of the cheese factory.

title: () Dueñas - P-903
description: 10 minutes from the highway, location in the middle of nature, no services, in fact there are thousands of possible locations, with each track that leaves in this pine forest, we had gone even further to "the area recreativa de nalvalco" where there was a park for children but there were too many insects suddenly, we find this area. Night without any noise, hardly anyone drives on the road next to it from 7 p.m.

title: (34209) Tariego de Cerrato - 1 Diseminado Monte Propios
title_short: (34209) Tariego de Cerrato - 1 Diseminado Monte Propios
description: Monte los Propios picnic area, quiet, 4G, some shade for vehicles but the tables are very shaded, no other facilities, spectacular night, spring and autumn, forest of holm oaks and gall oaks

title: (47100) Tordesillas - Avenida Santa Teresa
description: Perfect for the night. Grass, picnic tables. Rowing club next door. A superb view. A random place on map, a good surprise. Accessible by camping car also

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 10 Calle Villavieja del Cerro
description: Street closed bondholders quiet views

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 4 Avenida Santa Teresa
description: Asphalt parking, very quiet, with views from a viewpoint to the Douro River.

title: (47315) Pesquera de Duero - 23 Calle Nevera
description: Area next to the Duero, with tables, benches and barbecue. Quiet. To stop or sleep. You have to walk to get there. Ground entry but no problem. Shade of poplars. Litter bins. And a bridge and a town with good local wine!

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 7A Calle Gutiérrez Mellado
description: Ideal place to spend the night or visit the site of the city. Very central. At the l'Astral campsite, on the river there is the possibility of emptying gray and black water and loading clean water. Attention market on Tuesday morning.

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 18 Carretera Madrid-Coruña
description: Parking next to the pool ideal for hot hours and overnight and with recreational area next to the children and eat

title: (40297) - Avenida Polideportivo
description: Quiet area next to the pools. WC nearby, park with tables and barbecue. safe and quiet

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 25 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Parking beach of Tordesillas river Duero.

title: (47100) Tordesillas - 29 Extrarradio Diseminados
description: Swimming pool, football parking lot on gravel with individual trees but mostly without shade. So far from the street that you can't hear any cars. Trash can available. Fresh water about 100m away.

title: (47490) Rueda - 50 Calle Real
description: Parallel to the main street next to the cemetery, very quiet at night, you only hear the highway rushing in the distance. Opposite a very good Vinoteca Maxi. In the area also many Bodegas.

title: (47490) Rueda - 23 Calle Las Eras
description: Motorhome area with water filling and emptying service. There are places for about 7 motorhomes, two of them with shade.

name: Camping El Astral
title: (47100) Camping El Astral
description:
Tordesillas, Camino de Pollos, 8.
Camping "El Astral", beautiful site.
Dog, with bath for dogs (free hair dryer) and access allowed to the Bar-Restaurant.

title: (34208) - 123 Poligono Llanos San Isidro
description: Unfinished housing estate in the middle of nature with a lot of stabilized parking space.

title: () Peñafiel - Calle Vivero
description: We spent a quiet night here on the edge of the forest, the forest isn't quite as full of rubbish as closer to town.

title: (47490) Rueda - 108 Calle Santísimo Cristo
description: Playground at the end of the main street of the city. picnic area and fountain. Very quiet to spend the night. city ​​with interesting gastronomic offer.

name: Camping Riberduero
title: (47300) Camping Riberduero
description: Camping Riberduero is a small rustic and quiet campsite in the heart of the Ribera del Duero. The campsite has 10 bungalows, 40 pitches, a swimming pool and restaurant and is located 1 km from the city of Peñafiel (supermarkets, bars / restaurants, castle, etc.).

title: (34208) - 5D Carretera General
description: Petrol station with 10 places reserved for motorhomes. Free water, coin operated electricity. Noisy because of the road, but seems safe

title: (47134) Torrelobatón - 23 Calle Hospital
description: Earthen parking around the castle of Torrelobaton. It is said that the castle is the best preserved of Castile and Leon, a visit is mandatory. The town is 50 meters away and includes, among other things, an impressive church (the interior is amazing), a plaza and pleasing municipal pools.

title: () Peñafiel - 13D Calle Mercado Viejo
description: Calle del Mercado Viejo is a wide avenue with trees and service road with good parking spaces where you can spend the night without problems. It can be a good option if someone does not dare to spend the night in the parking lot at the base of the castle.

title: (47300) Peñafiel - 24 Plaza Flor
description: This free parking is a quieter place than the one in the castle area. It is 5 minutes from downtown and next to the national highway

title: (47300) Peñafiel - 19D Calle Calvario
description:
Launderette. 
Machines ONLY take 1 euro coins. Our 12kg wash took 34 mins and the drier dried the whole lot pretty well with one drying cycle. Detergent provided and included in the price and automatically dispensed.

title: (40442) Samboal - Unnamed Road
description: Samboal recreational area 1km from the city center. It has picnic tables, barbecues, children's swings, garbage container. Lots of shade but hot in summer as it is situated in a pine forest. Samboal has a covered sports center with pediment and paddle tennis and in summer a municipal swimming pool.

title: (34190) Villamuriel de Cerrato - 83 Diseminado Diseminados
description: picnic area with several tables, barbecues, fountain with drinking water, out of civilization, next to the Castilla canal.

title: (34200) Venta de Baños - 7 Calle Ximénez Sandoval
title_short: (34200) Venta de Baños - 7 Calle Ximénez Sandoval
description: Venta Clean self-service laundry. Your laundry clean and dry in 1 hour. Open from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.

title: () Peñafiel - 40 Calle de los Destiladeros
description: Parking in 3 levels. Convenient to visit the city, the castle and the wine museum. Slightly sloping.

title: () Peñafiel - 56 Carretera Pesquera
description: Great pine forest with SHADOW !!, ideal to rest and although not less spending the night, it seems a quiet place despite passing a road.

title: (47300) - 9007 Calle Subida al Castillo
description: Castle parking. Few places but flat and calm, without service. Not suitable for motorhomes

title: (34200) Venta de Baños - 22 Calle Fuente B C
title_short: (34200) Venta de Baños - 22 Calle Fuente B C
description: Great fountain, spring water.

title: (34200) Venta de Baños - 12 Calle Ermita B C
title_short: (34200) Venta de Baños - 12 Calle Ermita B C
description: A calm place to spent a night, not side by side with the motorway so you can rest with silence and birds singing in the morning. This is the park of the cemetery and there’s nearby a visigothic church “ San Juan de Baños”. Very recommendable and even with some chades.

title: (47300) Peñafiel - 7B Camino Bodegas Protos
description: It is a parking lot for cars next to Bodegas Protos and the totally empty cemetery where you can spend a very quiet night.

title: (34200) Baños de Cerrato - 13 Calle Ermita B C
title_short: (34200) Baños de Cerrato - 13 Calle Ermita B C
description: Located in the parking lot of the Wisigoth Church (VII century) of San Juan de Baños. Quiet city, with fountain, WC in the bar opposite. You can spend the night without problems.

title: (40496) Ciruelos de Coca - 1 Calle del Sotillo
title_short: (40496) Ciruelos de Coca - 1 Calle del Sotillo
description: Ciruelos de Coca. Small town quiet to sleep. In the square in front of the church there is a fountain to recharge water.

title: (40240) Gomezserracín - 63 A-601
description: Rest area next to the road equipped with a fountain picnic tables and children's area has shade. quiet place next to restaurant with menu and gas station

title: (40442) Samboal -
description: Tentetieso forest refuge in the public forest of Samboal. It has a fireplace. Ideal to spend the day/night in the middle of nature. If you have a minicamper, for example, and it rains, you can use the shelter to "live". In its surroundings there are numerous forest trails for walking, mountain biking or 4x4. On Sundays in hunting season it is frequented by hunters who use it to make their lunches and warm up. It does not have any type of service except the fireplace, it is in the middle of nature.

title: (47100) Tordesillas -
description: Rest area with many shades of pine trees and tables. Good place to make a landing

title: (47115) Bercero - VP-5602
description: Quiet place in a pine forest. It is accessed by a dirt road. It is a place where people go out to walk their dogs, during the day and in the afternoon it is quite busy.

name: Área de Autocaravanas “ San Martin “
title: (34191) Área de Autocaravanas “ San Martin “
description: Motorhome Area "San Martin". Very quiet place in the heart of a typical old medieval village. Very nice historical monuments to visit. Air at the end of town with free services. Maximum stay 72h

title: (40480) Coca - 30 Calle Canongia
description: Perfect parking to sleep and see the town. In front of the tower of San Nicolas. Without services

title: (47400) Medina del Campo - 19D Avenida Castillo
description: Parking next to the cemetery, outside the castle grounds.

title: (47400) Medina del Campo - 10 Avenida Castillo
description: Perfect parking to visit the beautiful Castle, easy access with large ac, parking is inside the castle grounds.

title: (40480) Coca - 1X Avenida Constitución
description: Quiet residential place in the center of the town of Coca next to the spectacular Castle of the fifteenth century that bears the same name as the villa. Quiet night, without services, with source of drinking water in the park next door.

title: (40480) Coca - 2X Rotonda Castillo
description: Parking at the foot of the wall of the Coca Castle moat, without services, very quiet, although a bit hidden. Cement floor, level.

title: (34190) Villamuriel de Cerrato - 19 Avenida Aguilera
description: Free motorhome area with 7 seats, two filling and emptying points, free electricity 8 points, maximum stay time 72 hours, next to the municipal swimming pools, opposite there is a pavilion inside it has a covered playground and a bar where it can be eaten

title: (40480) Coca - 9 Complejo Estación del Ferrocarril
description: Large flat land (no water electricity drain not lit) just at the entrance of the village before the gas station. Some heavy trucks to park. 200 m from the castle. No sign prohibiting parking. We stayed the night without any problem.

title: (40241) Cuéllar - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area lost in the middle of nowhere. there are concrete slabs near the almost flat chapel where you can park. no service but it can help because there is not much in the area.

title: (34191) Ampudia - 26 Calle Reoyo
description: Ample and quiet space, park a truck and is near the town

title: (47400) Medina del Campo - 41 Calle Explanada del Cuartel
title_short: (47400) Medina del Campo - 41 Calle Explanada del Cuartel
description: Parking very comfortable and spacious in the countryside medina.

name: Camping-Restaurante El Cantosal
title: (40480) Camping-Restaurante El Cantosal
description: Camping el cantosal since july 2014. great place to stay.

title: (34190) Villamuriel de Cerrato - 26 Calle Mayor
description:
CE Colada Expres Laundromat
Free on street parking outside.
coins only! Change machine inside and a Santander bank next door.

title: (34190) Villamuriel de Cerrato - 87 Camino Sirga
description: Municipal sports center parking. there are large bus squares. to spend the night if you can't find anything in the area. there are some bars and market nearby.

title: (47400) Medina del Campo - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place surrounded by pine trees on the outskirts of Medina. For a passing night, very good! On the main path there are quite a few people walking, if you leave the main path you will find areas to spend the night.

title: (34191) Palencia - 100 Carretera Boquilla
description: Very quiet place on the outskirts of the city, there is a rubbish bin at the entrance to the car parks and a bar on the other side of the roundabout.

title: (40470) Navas de Oro - SG-V-3422
description: Recreational area, just stop for the day, I did not sleep, shadows and tranquility

title: (34190) Villamuriel de Cerrato - 10 Los Olmillos
description:
Large day and night parking, well delimited and completely level and paved. Very good lighting and quite quiet during the day and even more so at night. It has 4 larger spaces where AC or large volume vans can be parked without difficulty.
Two bars and a small grocery store (typical store that has a little of everything) in front of the parking lot.

title: (34191) Palencia - 73 Carretera Caracol
description: Quiet place with views of the city of Palencia. The city is well worth it, do not hesitate to go down and see it! Remember that if we leave the places we went through clean, we can continue to enjoy them.

title: (47816) Montealegre de Campos - 1 Calle Nicolas Rodriguez
title_short: (47816) Montealegre de Campos - 1 Calle Nicolas Rodriguez
description: Just against the castle of Monteallegre, this spot is quite fantastic. Park on the grass near the castle for more discretion. No shops nearby but public water fountain in the medieval village adjacent to the castle. Be careful though the wind!

title: (47400) Medina del Campo - 38 Camino Velascálvaro-Urblassalinas
description: Área recreational Las Salinas, con mesas and sombras in a pinar al lado del Hotel Palacio Las Salinas.

title: (47493) San Vicente del Palacio - Autovía del Noroeste
title_short: (47493) San Vicente del Palacio - Autovía del Noroeste
description: I spent the night, so be careful with the generator running all night, for those who are light sleepers a lot of truck traffic, and a lot of refrigerated trucks in front of the hotel and not far from the RV area. and buses with a lot of passengers. it would be good if the people at the station asked the refrigerated trucks to go further because the parking lot is really big. otherwise, restaurant, shop etc ... sorry I did not inquire about the prices of the services because I do not speak Spanish.

title: (34004) Palencia - 40A Avenida de Madrid
description: Ideal locations for a night stage. Easy and direct access by the motorway. Reserved marking and consequent ground camper pitches (asphalt parking). No limitation of height. Carrefour supermarket at 350 m

title: (34247) Cevico Navero - 50 CL-619
description: A small picnic and parking area on the outskirts of town. tables, shade, exercise bench, playground, small stream

title: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in the heart of nature, flat, overlooking the river, access by a track in good condition for all HGV vehicles included, 15/20 min from Palencia, no services, no tables or bins, following small negative point the direction of the wind you can hear the train or the highway, I stayed there two nights in great calm no problem. good road

title: (34220) Magaz de Pisuerga - 10 Avenida Virgen de Villaverde
title_short: (34220) Magaz de Pisuerga - 10 Avenida Virgen de Villaverde
description: Along the entire street you can park without problem. The parking area is not delimited, so the length of the vehicle does not matter. The area is safe and quiet, from time to time the police pass by. The town center is an 8-minute walk away, there is a pharmacy, bars and restaurants. Nearby are the municipal swimming pools, in the summer months there are a lot of people, so I recommend the area on the other side of town.

title: (34305) Villerías de Campos - 1 Calle Travesia Santa Maria
title_short: (34305) Villerías de Campos - 1 Calle Travesia Santa Maria
description: Small picnic area where to spend the night by the side of the road. With drinking water point, shaded plus a picnic table. Possible for two vans. Watch out for stumps. fairly flat terrain.

title: (40460) -
description: Place by the river, with little water in summer. With a games area and two tables to eat and at 50m several more tables and benches. Spring fountain. very calm. 3km from Nava de la Asuncion, a town with all services.

title: (40295) Mudrián -
description: In a magnificent pine forest, there are dirt roads that allow you to isolate yourself and enjoy the peace and nature... no prohibition signs... rather for cells, vans or small vans. In the morning (a Thursday in mid-April) no hikers, no hunters, no foresters and we left the place at noon! Ideal before going to see the castle of Coca.

title: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato -
description: Nice little spot on the edge of the forest! We spent the night there peacefully. No noise ! Easy access.

title: (34305) Villerías de Campos - 16 Calle Granada
description: Comfortable parking place to rest or stay overnight, but above all to get close to a cheese shop near an excellent sheep's cheese typical of Tierra de Campos

title: (34191) Autilla del Pino - 117 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Parking of the viewpoint of land of fields. Beautiful views and food in typical wineries in the area.

title: (34220) Magaz de Pisuerga - 63 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Stand off road along a river. No amenities.

title: (34220) Magaz de Pisuerga - 31 Carretera Burgos
description: Unpaved parking area. It is next to a highway, but has little traffic. The area is safe and there are no problems to park any type of vehicle. There are bars 50m away, and the town center is a 5-minute walk away where there is another restaurant.

title: (34249) Villaviudas - 7 Camino Valdemadera
description: Parking area next to the municipal pool. Good shade throughout the day.

title: (34005) Palencia - 31 Calle Ponce de León
description: It is simply a level parking to be able to spend the night, when the motorhome area at 100 m is full, as it did for us.

title: (34005) Palencia - 12B Avenida Isla Dos Aguas
description: Quiet camera location near a park. Police regularly check the motorhome. 300m near the center.

title: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato - 6 Calle del Río
title_short: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato - 6 Calle del Río
description: Ideal for a short break for one night, calm you can take out the fishing rods and put your feet in the water! Shaded on the other hand, do not take the road to the restaurant, take the next one, however, with 8m5 long and 3m50 high, we passed

title: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato - 6 Calle del Río
title_short: (34208) Reinoso de Cerrato - 6 Calle del Río
description: Beautiful wild pitch by the river with trees, without any further supplies. Above is a restaurant, which is currently closed. The last 100 meters approach via a dirt road.

title: (34005) Palencia - 52 Avenida Viñalta
description: Area and eco-sanitary point in front of a gas station. When refueling you will receive (after ordering) a free coin for 100 liters of water. The motorhome has a very good washing area with the option to wash the roof of the motorhome. The emptying of crises waters and black waters is free. There is a laundry room and showers. A paved place with terrace and shade 10 minutes walk from the center and with a nice park to walk across the street. Nice restaurant across the road. Great tapas! This area with advice and inauguration of ACYLA

title: (34001) Palencia - 3 Calle Joaquín Costa
description: Great self service laundry, clean and easy service. With many languages.

title: (47210) Ataquines - Camino del Silo
description: Public parking next to municipal swimming pool and bar, quiet (maybe not so much on weekends), without traffic, flat, shade, between cereal fields. Possibility of sleeping.

title: (34240) Baltanás - 5 Calle Arreñales de Revilla
description: Very quiet place with toilet services, gray water and clean water filling. A town with a lot of atmosphere. Payment services through tokens that must be purchased in various places in town. 1 euro, 15 minutes.

title: (40450) Nava de la Asunción - 11 Avenida del Balonmano Nava
title_short: (40450) Nava de la Asunción - 11 Avenida del Balonmano Nava
description: Parking next to the Guerrero Naveros sports center, Nava Handball team of Asobal. Next to a hotel and fabulous park. Village with all services.

title: (34001) Palencia - 5 Calle Juan Ramon Jimenez
description: Great parking to park very close to the city center and enjoy its services.

title: (34004) Palencia - 8 Calle de Marta Domínguez
description: Quiet and safe area, next to a shopping center, and five minutes from the historic center.

title: (34004) Palencia - 19 Avenida Brasilia
description: Day and night parking in a dead-end street, next to the football stadium and social security building

title: (34005) Palencia - 2 Avenida Obispo Barberá
description: Parking next to nature and close to all services
